channel.title: Disable Flight in Moar Factory Tablet?
channel.description:
Hey all,
New here trying to figure out the world of modded Satisfactory. We have installed Moar Factory mod but the tablet allows free flight for the host and we want to play without any flight other than jet packs. Does anyone know if we can disable this feature as we love the other additions on the mod?

item.title: Disable Flight in Moar Factory Tablet?
